AddLinks: Click here to edit menu items
AddBackgroundHeading: I’m a heading. Click here to edit me.
AddBackgroundParagraph: I’m a paragraph. Click here to add your own text and edit me. It’s easy. Just hit the «Edit» button from top right or click anywhere on me.
AddBackgroundButton: Click here to add a button
FooterText: I’m a footer text. Click here to add your own text and edit me.
UrlDescription: This is your showcase URL address (once you publish your showcase).
ShowcasePublished: Your showcase is published and available online.
Name: Name
StockDescription: A royalty free library of over 500k videos, photos, illustrations and audio tracks.
ShowcasePrivacyDescription: Publishing a showcase will allow you to set the privacy for it. You can keep it public, or you can restrict to selected people.
MembersLink: Members of organization with the link
MembersLinkDescription: Access allowed for authenticated members of the organization with link.
SpecificDomainsDescription: Access allowed for invited people with the link. Access requires email address verification by receiving a code.
AnyoneWithLinkAndPassword: Anyone with the link and password
AnyoneWithLinkAndPasswordDescription: Anyone on the internet with this link and password can access. No authentication required.
AnyoneWithLinkDescription: Anyone with the link can access. No authentication or email verification required.
NoShowcases: You have no showcases. Create your first one right now.
NoSharedShowcases: You have no showcases shared with you
NoText: No text has been defined for this area.
EnableArticleText: Enable article text on the player page
EnableArticleComments: Enable article comments on the player page
TypeIDPlaceholder: Type your Touchcast video ID here…
NoMatches: Sorry, we couldn't find any matches for
AddVideoOrImage: Add a background video or image to your showcase and it will appear here.
HeadingCaps: Force ALL CAPS for heading text
TitleCaps: Force ALL CAPS for category title
EnablePersonSettings: Enable display of people on cards
TagsInfo: Add tags for search and filtering purposes.
ChooseFilterLabel: Choose a filter item to edit
ShowShortcuts: Enable shortcuts menu for faster navigation
PeopleInvite: Invite people to work on this showcase
PersonJoined: opened editor for this showcase. Only one person can edit the showcase at a time, so we recommend:
PersonEditing: is already editing this showcase. Only one person can edit the showcase at a time, so we recommend:
GetInTouch: Get in touch with other person to check when you can open the editor again.
AskPerson: Ask the other person to close the editor.
ShowFollow: Allow users to follow this showcase and receive email notifications
SendNotification: Send followers an email notification to let them know about your changes
OnWithRequest: Everyone else can view the card and request access
OnForEditors: On - only owner and editors can access
cardDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this card?
ShowcaseDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this showcase?
StartScreenAdvanced: Show title and description on start screen for player pages
StartScreenAuthor: Show author details on start screen for player pages
EnableIndexingSetting: Enabled indexing for search purposes once showcase is published
NosharedFiles: Sorry, there are no files on the list.
ShowShareControl: Show share control for player pages
AnalyticsGraphTitle: Total visits and unique visitors over time
ShowLikesText: Enable ability to like content (only available for when privacy of the showcase is set to "Members of organization with the link"
